title: Dexter
review: This show is amazing! It puts the watcher inside the mind of serial killer, forensics expert, and sociopath, Dexter Morgan. With a unique skillset and his late father's advice, he just might never be caught.

title: Gray's Anatomy
review: If you enjoy seeing the chaos of a hospital ER, then you'll love watching the chaos surrounding the life of a young intern, Marideth Gray.

title: Gotham
review: While this show serves as a fun reminder of DC villains and has comic-like action and events, it goes against many other transmedia surrounding the DC universe.

title: El Camino
review: Breaking Bad fanatics were shocked when this movie sequel came to Netflix. It caught many by pleasant surprise and deserved all the hype that it received. The movie centers around Jesse Pinkman and the fallout of the climax of the Breaking Bad series. I won't spoil anything as this movie would be nothing without its predecessor, so if you want watch this movie, I suggest you spend the necessary 62 hours to watch the complete Breaking Bad series. You will not regret it.

title: In The Tall Grass
review: Not the scariest, but will definitely have you saing, "what the frick did I just watch."

title: Bird Box
review: Possibly one of the greatest Netflix Originals ever put out. This movie is captivating from start to finish and is a must-see! If you didn't believe all the hype that this movie received when it first came out, you're missing out!

title: Snowpiercer
review: Get ready to be slightly claustrophobic for the next 2 hours and 6 minutes. The entire movie takes place on a train. Don't you worry, though. You'll get to watch Chris Evans scowl and fight his way from the caboose, to the front engine.
